links.link_name: Financial Services AI Adoption Reduces Office Demand
links.status: ACTIVE -- confirmed by multiple data sources
links.mechanism: Financial services firms (NAICS 52) are the largest category of office tenants in US CBDs. AI adoption drives demand destruction through 3 channels: (1) HEADCOUNT REDUCTION: 60% of firms reducing head

links.link_name: CMBS Distress Crystallizes as Canary Indicator
links.mechanism: CMBS is the CANARY because it CANNOT extend-and-pretend -- structured maturity dates force resolution. Unlike bank loans where lenders can modify terms, CMBS bondholders have contractual rights that p

links.status: APPROACHING -- gap between CMBS truth (12.34%) and bank fiction (1.2%) MUST close
links.mechanism: Banks hold ~70% of all CRE loans (~$2.8T of $4T total). Unlike CMBS, banks CAN extend-and-pretend: they modify loan terms, extend maturities, accept interest-only payments, and delay loss recognition.

links.link_name: Regional Bank CRE Stress Transmits to Credit Markets

links.link_name: Employment and Fiscal Revenue Feedback Effects
links.mechanism: The final link in the cascade: CRE value destruction feeds back through (A) LOCAL EMPLOYMENT: construction workers, property managers, building operations staff, commercial brokers, RE services worker
